title: Twins 2016 Spring Training schedule is here
text:
Twins 2016 Spring Training schedule is here news-press.com 6:14 p.m. EDT October 14, 2015 Twins logo (Photo: Twins) 
The Minnesota Twins announced the complete schedule for their 2016 Spring Training on Wednesday. 
Twins pitchers and catchers are scheduled to report on Sunday, Feb. 21, with their first workout slated for Monday, Feb. 22. The balance of the squad is scheduled to report on Friday, Feb. 26, with full-squad workouts beginning on Saturday, Feb. 27. 
The Twins' 2016 schedule features 33 games (15 home, 18 road) starting with a road game against the Boston Red Sox on Wednesday, March 2. The Twins then return to the CenturyLink Sports Complex to face the Red Sox for their Spring home opener on Thursday, March 3. 
Other highlights of the Twins' home schedule include visits by the St. Louis Cardinals (March 8), the Philadelphia Phillies (March 9), the New York Yankees (March 20) and the Pittsburgh Pirates (March 21, March 26). 
Spring training season and group tickets are now on sale and can be purchased by calling 800-33-TWINS (800-338-9467) or 612-33-TWINS (612-338-9467). Single-game tickets go on sale on Saturday, Jan. 9. 
Minnesota Twins 2016 Spring Training schedule 
(All games at 1:05 p.m. unless noted) 
Wednesday, March 2: at Boston Red Sox 
Thursday, March 3: vs. Boston Red Sox, 7:05 p.m. 
Friday, March 4: at Pittsburgh Pirates 
Saturday, March 5: vs. Baltimore Orioles 
Sunday, March 6: at Tampa Bay Rays 
Monday, March 7: at Baltimore Orioles 
Tuesday, March 8: vs. St. Louis Cardinals (SS); at Philadelphia Phillies (SS) 
Wednesday, March 9: vs. Philadelphia Phillies 
Thursday, March 10: at Boston Red Sox 
Friday, March 11: vs. Miami Marlins 
Saturday, March 12: at Baltimore Orioles 
Sunday, March 13: vs. Baltimore Orioles 
Monday, March 14: at St. Louis Cardinals 
Wednesday, March 16: vs. Boston Red Sox, 7:05 p.m. 
Thursday, March 17: at Baltimore Orioles, 7:05 p.m. 
Friday, March 18: at Boston Red Sox 
Saturday, March 19: at Pittsburgh Pirates 
Sunday, March 20: vs. New York Yankees 
Monday, March 21: vs. Pittsburgh Pirates 
Tuesday, March 22: vs. Baltimore Orioles 
Wednesday, March 23: vs. Tampa Bay Rays 
Thursday, March 24: at Miami Marlins 
Friday, March 25: at Tampa Bay Rays 
Saturday, March 26: vs. Pittsburgh Pirates 
Sunday, March 27: at New York Yankees 
Monday, March 28: at Pittsburgh Pirates 
Tuesday, March 29: vs. Boston Red Sox (SS) ; at Tampa Bay Rays (SS) 
Wednesday, March 30: vs. Tampa Bay Rays 
Thursday, March 31: vs. Boston Red Sox 
Friday, April 1: at Washington Nationals (Washington, D.C.), TBA
